level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 17-145, the "Uniform Anatomical Gift Revision Act of 2008", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No.17-58 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 8, 2008, and February 5, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 25, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-311 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-145 became effective on April 15, 2008.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon §§ 1 and 9 of the Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (1968 Act). See 8A Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
